definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: The staff wanted him to live and prayed with him everyday.
sentences.chinese: 工作人員鼓勵他活下去，並每天與他一道做祈禱。

sentences.english: I don't really care whether I'm going to survive.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎是否會活下去。

sentences.english: Or we might say,look,certainly I have a right to life.
sentences.chinese: 我們可能會說，當然是我有活下去的權利。

sentences.english: People will be disappointed but will live.
sentences.chinese: 人們會失望的，但是他們還會活下去。

sentences.english: The soul in people's memory, princess heart live forever.
sentences.chinese: 靈魂化做回憶，在人們的心中永遠活下去。

sentences.english: Because, that's the only way we can live with ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 因爲，只有這樣，我們才能堂堂正正的活下去。

sentences.english: So if pandas can survive, that would be great.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果熊貓能活下去，那好極了。

sentences.english: You're right. Let's just get on. I'll see you outside before you see me.
sentences.chinese: 你所言極是，好好活下去，我將在外頭第一個看望你。

sentences.english: I got no reason to live!
Jinny : I can't live like this any longer because someone has killed everyone in my family.
sentences.chinese: 我不能這樣活下去了，因爲有人已經殺了我全家人。

sentences.english: At times Chuck had wondered whether or not he would survive.
sentences.chinese: 有一段時間，恰克一直在想自己是否能活下去。

sentences.english: Try to forgive, teach me to live.
sentences.chinese: 我嘗試著去寬恕，讓您教我如何活下去。

sentences.english: Just like the plants, we must go on and live.
sentences.chinese: 就像這些植物一樣，我們也會往前走，活下去。

sentences.english: I never have days when I think I can live without football.
sentences.chinese: 我從未想過如果有一天離開足球我還能活下去。

sentences.english: He died so that the others might live .
sentences.chinese: 爲了其他的人能活下去，他自己犧牲了。

definition: life/to survive/to save a life/to scrape a living
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

definition: to seek survival/to possess the will to live
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
